duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform security analysis, documentation authoring, source code review, and operational testing for cryptographic IT products.
Conduct presentations and workshops with customers, and prepare comprehensive reports based on the findings.
Review cryptographic module design specifications, execute source code and operational test plans, and report observed results.
Ensure testing activities comply with applicable standards and methodologies related to FIPS 140 validation.
Consult with senior engineers on testing matters requiring clarification and collaborate to develop creative solutions.

education_certification.credential: Post-secondary program in IT security, computer science, or engineering
